prompt: Create a compact photo gallery viewer with a professional, grayscale aesthetic. The main image, displaying a black-and-white cityscape, should be centered at the top with 10px rounded corners and no shadow. Include a horizontal thumbnail gallery with 4 images (50x50px, 6px corners, 5px spacing) in a white container (#FFFFFF) with a thin gray border (1px, #B0B0B0). Place two action buttons at the bottom in a centered row: a gray heart icon (#616161) and a gray share icon (#616161), each in a square container with 12px padding and a light gray background (#EEEEEE). Use a light gray scaffold background (#F5F5F5) with 14px padding. The app bar should have a white background, a gray back arrow, and a title 'Monochrome Gallery' in gray bold text. The design should feel minimal, clean, and professional with tight spacing.
